full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BDAG NYID CHEN POS YAB SRAS KYI THU BO MKHAS GRUB SMRA BA'I NYI MA LA CHIG BRGYUD DU STZAL PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI BRJED BYANG GRUB GNYIS DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,ZHES MKHAS GRUB CHIG BRGYUD KYI BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR GYI BRJED BYANG 'DI YANG DMIGS PA MED PA'I THUGS RJE CHEN PO DANG LDAN PA BKA' DRIN ZLA ME MED ^ 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO DANG, SMRA BA'I DBANG PHYUG 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA DKON MCHOG DGYES PA'I BLO GROS RNAM GNYIS LAS 'DI'I NYAMS KHRID LEGS PAR THOB PA'I TSE DGE SLONG SHES RAB RGYA MTSOS DRAN GSO TZAM DU BRIS PA'O,, ,,AOm SVA STI, CHOS SRID 'BYOR BA'I MDZOD DANG DGE BCU LDAN, ,DGA' LDAN RAB RGYAS ZHES BYA'I RGYUD GRVA CHER, KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA YAB SRAS KYI, ,THUGS RJES CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED RGYUN 'DI SPEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,
